title: 5/100 [多人]飢餓遊戲 ~有意义回復+1JB~全世界給我過來加分~不准吐槽
author: s100761
txt_content:
本帖最后由 s100761 于 2012-7-8 20:49 编辑 

Rules
A set of suggested rules that most games tend to play by:
No Flying/ Speed hacksOnly break leaf blocks, vines and mushroomsNo placing blocks, Other than water/lava bucketsTeams Are Allowed but only one player may winHave Fun and play fair
Chinese see 3L




国内网盘 :
资源:115网盘附件下载:Hunger Games v2.zip (15.24MB)

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content: 好吧勿机翻……宁愿你搬英文算了

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
No Flying/ Speed hacks（禁止飞行，加速作弊）
Only break leaf blocks, vines and mushrooms（只能破坏树叶，蔓藤和蘑菇）
No placing blocks, Other than water/lava buckets（不得放置方块，除了水/岩浆桶）
Teams Are Allowed but only one player may win（可以组队但只能有1人获胜）
Have Fun and play fair（玩的公平！玩的开心！）

replies.author: geludan
sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
geludan 发表于 2012-7-8 20:36 
这搬运质量不得不说，太渣了，网盘照搬国外的，没有传国内网盘，而且为什么不翻译？
你和我聊天可用了很多 ...
好吧我顺手翻译了……

replies.txt_content:
